<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Aives The Smoke Dragon](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2014)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 16</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +8, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 56

**Immunities**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

**Surprise Attack** On the first round of combat, if Aives rolled [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to him.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus Smoke Exhalation

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing plus Smoke Exhalation

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 18
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59)

**Quick Draw** <actions string="Single Action" />  Aives draws a weapon with an Interact action, then Strikes with the weapon he just drew.

**Smoke Exhalation** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) Aives breathes out a cloud of poisonous smoke that he can make curl around him or cling to his weapons. Until the cloud dissipates at the start of his next turn, Aives is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), his Strikes deal an extra 1d8 poison damage, and targets of his Strikes must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Aives deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Aives The Smoke Dragon
